data.name: Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel
data.desc: Visit attractions and popular malls via ADCB metro station (1.5 km).Relax at the hotel's rooftop pool with stunning skyline views, sauna, hot tub and Jacuzzi.Savour Indian delicacies at the on-site Masala Bazaar restaurant.
data.location: An upscale property in Bur Dubai, Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel offers luxurious stays opposite Burjuman Mall and Burjuman Metro Station!

data.name: Fortune Grand Hotel
data.desc: It has a pool, hot tub and a nightclub for a fun-filled holiday.The hotel lies within 5 km of Dubai International Airport.The hotel’s multilingual staff is fluent in Hindi and Malayalam. Enjoy Indian food at in-house restaurants Padheyam, Ragini, and Sa Re Ga Ma.
data.location: Located on Omar Bin Khattab Road, Fortune Grand Hotel offers wellness facilities and comfortable stays.

data.name: Phoenix Park Inn by Radisson
data.desc: Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool.Start your day with a refreshing workout session at the on-site fitness centre featuring state-of-the-art equipment.Satiate your palate with regional Goan dishes and mouth-watering international cuisines at the on-site restaurant, Chapora.
data.location: Lavish rooms, multiple dining spots, an outdoor swimming pool and a host of amenities await you for a delightful stay at this luxurious property.

data.name: Vivanta Goa, Panaji
data.desc: Features a full-service spa and a rooftop swimming pool for complete rejuvenation.Received the certification of “ISO 22K” for its quality food services.Arranges a romantic rooftop dinner with a 5-course gourmet meal and a fairytale setting.Houses award-winning restaurants serving exotic global flavours and handcrafted beverages.
data.location: An epitome of excellence and luxury, Vivanta Goa delivers a fine blend of contemporary accommodation and state-of-the-art facilities.

data.name: A Scenic trip to Ooty from Bangalore
data.desc: People in love, join a road trip to Ooty! Walk up to the highest peak of the Nilgiri mountains! Visit the Ooty Botanical Gardens for a blissful time.
data.Activity: Sightseeing in Ooty: Doddabetta Peak, Sim's Park, Dolphin's Nose, Botanical Grrdens, Ooty Lake

data.name: A Scenic trip to Ooty and Coorg from Bangalore
data.desc: People in love, join a road trip to Ooty and coorg! Walk up to the highest peak of the Nilgiri mountains and explore cofee planations of Coorg! Visit the Ooty Botanical Gardens for a blissful time mixed with serene beauty of Coorg.
Activity: Sightseeing in Ooty: Doddabetta Peak, Sim's Park, Dolphin's Nose, Botanical Grrdens, Ooty Lake
Sightseeing in coorg: Abbey Falls, Mercara Gold estate Coffee

data.name: Amazing Goa Flight Inclusive Deal 3N
data.desc: A flight and hotel only package. Customize the package from a pool of optional activities to make your holiday memorable! From adventure activities to heritage walks, your beach vacay comes with a host of optional activities.
Activity: Sightseeing in Goa: Ancestral Goa museum, Basilica de Bom Jesus, Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary

data.name: Kasol
data.title: Mini Israel in Himachal Pradesh
data.description: The hill-hamlet of Kasol stands at over 1,580 meters above sea level, in Himachal Pradesh, and flaunts raw natural beauty with lush conifer forests, snow-capped Himalayan mountains and winding rivers.

data.name: Shimla
data.title: Hub of Natural Bounties and Winter Sports
data.description: The erstwhile British ‘Summer Capital’ is packed with colonial-era architectural marvels, picturesque hilly hotspots, and a toy train tagged as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

data.name: Wayanad
data.title: Green Paradise in North-East Kerala
data.description: Located on the southern tip of the Deccan plateau, Wayanad is home to clear lakes, dense jungles, and deep valleys. This weekend getaway from Bengaluru, is a paradise for trekkers.

data.name: Gulmarg
data.title: Heaven in the White Hills of Kashmir
data.description: Gulmarg is the crowning glory of Jammu & Kashmir and is located 2,650 meters above sea level. Known as the “Meadow of Flowers”, it boasts of the world’s highest golf-course.

data.name: Coonoor
data.title: A Serene Hill Station in Tamil Nadu
data.description: Gulmarg is the crowning glory of Jammu & Kashmir and is located 2,650 meters above sea level. Known as the “Meadow of Flowers”, it boasts of the world’s highest golf-course.

data.name: Goa
data.title: Popular for Beaches & Nightlife
data.description: Popularly known as India’s party capital, Goa seduces travellers from all around the globe with its boho beaches, ancient churches, majestic forts and unbeatable nightlife!

data.name: Maldives
data.title: A Stunning Tropical Getaway
data.description: Home to sun-kissed beaches, swaying palms, sculpted coral reefs, luxury resorts and thrilling water sports, the tropical paradise called Maldives is a string of beautiful islands.

data.name: Lakshadweep
data.title: Tropical Band of Islands
data.description: Settled off the Kerala coast on Laccadive sea, Lakshadweep translates to ‘a hundred thousand islands’. A club of 36 atolls and coral reefs, the nature tourism destination is known for preserved ecology and water sports.

data.name: Pondicherry
data.title: Tropical Band of Islands
data.description: A fascinating, small town with enough elements to charm its visitors, Pondicherry whose official name was changed to Puducherry in 2006, was once the largest French colony in India.

data.name: Kovalam
data.title: Scenic Beach Town in Kerala
data.description: Dotted with swaying palms and fondly known as the 'Paradise of the South', Kovalam is a tranquil seaside town nestled along the picturesque coastlines of the Arabian Sea.

data.name: Gwalior
data.title: The Land of Palaces
data.description: As the cradle of Indian culture and heritage for many centuries, Gwalior is a timeless treasure of art and music. The cityscape is adorned with historical monuments and a hilltop fort that are souvenirs of the dynasties that ruled here.

data.name: Thimpu
data.title: Scenic mountain destination in Bhutan
data.description: Thimpu will fascinate you with its rich heritage. you will love lively festivals, lush valley. Also popular wildlife destination.

data.name: Mysore
data.title: Scenic royal city in Karnataka
data.description: City of Palaces with its vibrant history , arts and culture. Allures tourists with its majestic beauty, landscaped gardens

data.name: Hampi
data.title: Open Air museuam in Karnataka
data.description: UNESCO recognised world heritage site. Attracts backpackers and pilgrims alike to witness its forts and temples.

data.name: Kochi
data.title: Open port city in Kerala
data.description: City steeped in heritage. It hosts many beaches worth exploring. With hot and humid weather.

data.name: Havelock island
data.title: Picturesque tropical Gateway in Andamans
data.description: Celebrate your love in havelock islands. Offers you lots of adventurous activities

data.name: Srinagar
data.title: Paradise on the banks of Jhelam
data.description: Dreamy honeymoon with endless sightseeing and lively festivals.

data.name: Manali
data.title: Say hello to hippie valleys and scenic villages
data.description: Enjoy your honeymoon days with  many adventureous sports and waterfalls.

data.name: Munnar
data.title: Exotic Tea Paradise in Kerala
data.description: Spend your romatic days at Munnar. A wildlife destination with pleasant weather throuhout the day

data.name: Goa
data.title: Popular homeymoon destination with beaches and nightlife
data.description: Head to Goa for romantic honeymoon. Enjoy the breeze and indulge in adventure activies in Goa

data.name: Amritsar
data.title: Spiritual capital of Punjab
data.description: Soak in the mystic hues of Amritsar, a famous pilgrimage spot! You will love exploring sightseeing attractions and attending various festivals. The local cuisines at Amritsar are worth trying out too.

data.name: Guwahati
data.title: Assam's largest city
data.description: Located on the banks of River Brahmaputra against the backdrop of mighty Himalayan Ranges, Guwahati will steal your heart with its magnificent ancient temples, stunning hills, diverse wildlife and sprawling tea plantations.

data.name: Rameshwaram
data.title: Pilgrimage site in Tamil Nadu
data.description: Rameshwaram glistens with sheer divinity. You can expect sunny afternoons with bearable heat. Don’t forget to spend some time at the beaches of Rameshwaram.

data.name: Dubai
data.title: Ultramodern state in UAE
data.description: A mix of the modern living and traditional Arabic culture, Dubai is all things glittery with luxury malls, charming souks, cutting-edge clubs, gourmet restaurants and old-world eateries.

data.name: Singapore
data.title: Complete family destination
data.description: Unleash the adventure enthusiast in you at Singapore. You can expect moderate temperatures along with humidity. Singapore is also a popular wildlife destination.

data.name: Kasol
data.title: Mini Israel in Himachal Pradesh
data.description: The hill-hamlet of Kasol stands at over 1,580 meters above sea level, in Himachal Pradesh, and flaunts raw natural beauty with lush conifer forests, snow-capped Himalayan mountains and winding rivers.

data.name: Bangkok
data.title: Dynamic city of Thailand
data.description: Come and relish the culinary delights of Bangkok. You can expect high temperatures and humidity. Also, don’t miss the heritage structures at Bangkok.

data.name: Tokyo
data.title: Bustling metrolpolis in Japan
data.description: Tokyo is a haven for foodies. You will love the stunning cherry blossoms, fairs and festivals. Additionally, explore the rich heritage of Tokyo.

data.name: Hyderabad
data.title: City of Pearls
data.description: If you are a foodie, head straight to Hyderabad. You will love visiting historical monuments, going on city tours and shopping from vibrant markets. You can also admire the heritage landmarks at Hyderabad.

data.name: Alleppey
data.title: Nature lover's paradise in Kerala
data.description: If relaxation is what you’re after, head to Alleppey. You will love exploring the backwaters and houseboat stays. Don’t forget to spend some time at the beaches of Alleppey.

data.name: Maldives
data.title: A Stunning Tropical Getaway
data.description: Home to sun-kissed beaches, swaying palms, sculpted coral reefs, luxury resorts and thrilling water sports, the tropical paradise called Maldives is a string of beautiful islands.

data.name: Lakshadweep
data.title: Tropical Band of Islands
data.description: Settled off the Kerala coast on Laccadive sea, Lakshadweep translates to ‘a hundred thousand islands’. A club of 36 atolls and coral reefs, the nature tourism destination is known for preserved ecology and water sports.
